title: kaLLaraip-piDittiDuvOm
sahitya:
kaLLaraip-piDittiDuvOm jnAnattaDiyAl kaNDittu viraTTi viDuvOm vArungaL


anupallavi

  meLLap-pulan vazhiyE uLLE pughundarivaik-koLLai koNDE nALum saLLai sheyyum pollAda


caraNam    kAma krOdha lObha mOha kolaikAraraik-kaTTi vairAgyattAl veTTip-pudaiyungaL
tI manat-tiruDarai dhyAnattAl tITTungaL sIrum pAmbukkut-taDikAran mantiravAdi
